rules_text:
Whenever Maximus attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw a card.
Each nonland card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
